metadata.title: CVE-2020-11729 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in DAViCal Andrew's Web Libraries (AWL) through 0.60. Long-term session cookies, uses to provide long-term session continuity, are not generated securely, enabling a brute-force attack that may be successful.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-11729` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libawl-php - 0.61-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: awl package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.61-1').
